description: Try our easy to follow Classic Butter Chicken recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Butter chicken,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,Seafood free,Wheat free,Egg free,Low sugar,Chicken
name: Classic Butter Chicken Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 pkt the spice tailor classic butter chicken

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the chicken into generous cubes.
Heat 1 tsp. of oil in a nonstick frying pan, add spices and cook for 20 seconds.
Add the beans and chicken pieces and brown lightly before adding the base sauce and a small splash of water. Simmer for 12 minutes.
Stir in the main sauce and simmer for another 35 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through. Garnish with chopped coriander.
Serve with Naan bread or plain rice
